text: Enchant someone at the Station of Glamours
Take a picture with someone you met in the Mystique Gallery
Leave a note in the Altar of Secrets
Create a potion in the Blood Bar
Ask someone to teach you a small gesture that means “trust.”
Ask someone to tell you the first word that comes to mind when they see you.
Choose someone to teach you a secret gesture that only the two of you know.
Steal a kiss from a vampire
Steal a kiss from a creature of Mystique
Give a tight hug to the person who gives off the most mystical and safe energy
Ask someone 'What’s one small thing that always feels sensual to you?'
Leave a secret note somewhere in the house.
Trade an object you carry with someone else; don’t explain why.
Ask someone if you can read their palm. Tell them what the future reserves for them tonight.
Ask a vampire for a mark — lipstick, bite, or both.
Give someone a compliment that sounds like a spell.
Let someone choose a part of you to bless — forehead, wrist, heart, or lips.
Cast a quick “charm” on the group — invent a word and make them repeat it.
Draw a sigil on someone’s wrist using invisible ink (your fingertip).
Find a witch and ask them to bless your drink.
Steal a sip from someone’s glass — only if they let you.
Dare someone to tell you what they desire most tonight.
Find the most mysterious guest and ask them for a curse or blessing.
Let the person beside you decide your next mischief.
Find a stranger and tell them their aura tastes like something enchanting.
Ask a vampire for a kiss. Or offer one.
Find someone wearing black and tell them what power you think they have.
Whisper a spell into someone’s drink before they take a sip.
Speak in riddles for the next five minutes.
Pretend to be a famous witch and give someone a ridiculous prophecy.
Find the tallest person in the room and ask them to guard your secret.
Form a “temporary coven” of three and make up a spell together.
Declare a random object sacred and protect it for ten minutes.
Make up a scandal about the host. Spread it once, never explain.
Ask someone what they dreamt last night. Pretend it was a prophecy.
Find someone who hasn’t spoken much and ask them to share a secret gesture with you.
Leave a compliment written on a mirror. No signature.
Ask someone to describe the first thing they noticed about you.
Ask two people to teach you a secret handshake.
Whisper a wish into someone’s hands and close their fingers around it.
Ask for a single word that feels like a kiss.
Find someone with red lips and ask what they’ve cursed tonight.
Take a photo with someone you find magnetic. Don’t smile.
Start a rumor that a ghost has joined the party.
Swap drinks with someone and make a toast in another language (real or not).
Find someone with glitter and make them your accomplice. The night should be full of magic.
Find someone whose energy feels magnetic — tell them you feel the pull.
Ask someone to describe how they’d hex you if they could.
Let someone draw a small mark on your skin and call it a bond.
Find someone who smells divine. Tell them what memory their scent stirs.
Whisper “bite me” to someone who looks like they might.
Tell someone their aura glows red tonight.
Ask a stranger what sin you look most capable of.
Find someone whose hands you want to hold — then take them.
What color do you feel like right now — and why?
Ask someone when do they feel most powerful?
Ask someone 'What kind of magic do you wish existed, and what would you use it for?'
Ask someone 'If you were to charm someone, how would you do it?'
Ask someone 'What’s your most irresistible trait, according to you?'
Ask someone 'If you could enchant one person here tonight, who would it be?'
Ask someone 'How do you like to be desired?'
Ask someone 'What do you find most magnetic about someone?'
Find someone who shares your element — fire, water, air, or earth.
Ask someone 'If you had a familiar (animal companion), what would it be?'
Find your mirror — someone whose vibe feels like your reflection.
Ask someone 'What’s your most beautiful weakness?'
Ask someone 'What scent should someone wear to summon you?'
Ask someone 'What do you want people to feel when they look at you?'
Ask someone 'If you had to pick a poison, what would it taste like?'
Ask someone to tell you their favorite superstition
Ask someone to describe your energy in three words.
Ask someone 'If you could steal one thing from the moon, what would it be?'
Ask someone 'What kind of weather feels like your personality?'
Ask someone 'If you could speak with the stars for one minute, what would you ask?'
Ask someone 'If a witch was trying to summon you, what 3 things would she put in the summoning circle'
Ask someone 'What kind of glance says more than words?'
